chapter.text: Alm
Oebbi, ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa, Amuddir, Imezgi
Issers ak d Tazmamt s tidep, d atebbet n wayen ip id izwaren. Issers ed Tuoa akked Linoil
uqbel, d nnhaya i medden. Issers ed Leqwoan. Ih, wid inekoen issekniyen n Oebbi, fellasen aaaqeb uquie. Oebbi d Uzmir, Ippara d ppao
Ih, Oebbi ur aS iffir wacemma di tmurt, ne$ deg igenni
D Neppa i wen Ippaken udem, di taabbav, akken i S ihwa. Ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa, Uzmir, Bab n uuwab

Neppa i k ed Issersen Tazmamt, degs issekniyen uvhioen, nitni d tayimmap n Tezmamt. Wiyav d licwao. D$a, wid iwumi mmalen wulawen, teddun akked wayen illan d licwao, ssaramen ahewwel, ssaramen asefhem is. I Issnen asefhem is, siwa Oebbi. Qqaoen imawlan n tmusni: "numen yis. S$uo Mass nne$ akw". Id ismektayen, siwa uaqilen
A Mass nne$! Ur Smili ulawen nne$, mbaad ma Tenhiv a$. Efk a$ d, s$uoeK, aeunu. Ih, Kecc, ard Am$it
A Mass nne$! Kecc, s tidep, ara Ijemmlen medden, ass i$ef ur illi ccekk. S tidep, Oebbi ur Izeggel lemaahda
Ih, wid ijehlen, ur sen d ippawi acemma, ar Oebbi, wayla nnsen, ne$ tarwa nnsen. Widak, d nitni ay d isufa n tmes
D tin n ugdud n Feraun akked wid i ten id izwaren. Skaddben issekniyen nneÂ£. Iwwet iten Oebbi, ilmend ibekkaven nnsen. Oebbi Iwaao i uaaqeb
Ini i wid ijehlen: "a ppepwa$elbem, a ppepwafesrem di Loahennama". A yir usu

Ni$ d assekni, i kunwi, mi mlalent snat trebbuyaa. Yiwet tepna$ deg ubrid n Oebbi; tayev d tajehlit, twala d snat, s yieoi s. Oebbi Ippak afus, s tallalt iS, i win i S ihwan. Deg wayagi, s tidep, aselmed i wid ipwalin

D tucbiet ay d tedheo i yimdanen leemala n ccehwiyyat: tilawin, tarwa, iaammuoen ibararen n ddheb akked lfeiia, iaawdiwen n ccetla, lmal, akal. Ayagi, d zzhu n tmeddurt n ddunit. Oebbi, $uoeS amkan laali, n tu$alin
Ini: "ad awen mle$ i yifen aya? I wid ipeezziben, ar Mass nnsen, leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, degsen ad wekkoen, tilawin iufan, akked llza s$uo Oebbi". Oebbi Ipwali imdanen
wid iqqaoen: "a Mass nne$! Nekwni, s tidep, numen. Ihi, Semmee a$ ibekkaven nne$, Sellek a$ seg uaaqeb n tmes
Iueboiyen, imawlan n tidep, imvuaen, wid ipseddiqen, wid iste$fioen di tafrara
Icuhhed Oebbi ar ur illi oebbi, siwa Neppa. Akken lmalayek, akked imawlan n tmusni. Ibedd i lmizan. Ur illi oebbi, siwa Neppa, Uzmir, Bab n uuwab
Ih, ddin ar Oebbi d annuz. Ur mgarraden wid iwumi teppunefk Tezmamt, armi deffir n tisin n tussna $uosen, wa iqheo wa. Wid inekoen issekniyen n Oebbi, ihi, Oebbi Ip$awal deg uqeiii

Ma nuqmen k, ini: "unze$ aS i Oebbi. Akken, wid iddan yidi. Ini i wid iwumi teppunefk Tezmamt, akked at war tussna: "ma tunzem"? Ma unzen, ihi, pwanhan. Ma wexxoen, ay fellak siwa anabi. Oebbi Ipwali imdanen
Ih, wid inekoen issekniyen n Oebbi, u pna$en lambiyya, war ssebba, u pna$en wid seg yimdanen ippamoen lmizan, becceo iten s uaaqeb aqeoean
Widak, d wid iwumi mean igiten nnsen di ddunit, di laxert. Ur sain isellaken
Day ur twalav ara wid iwumi ippunefk kra si Tezmamt, la ssuturen, i Tezmamt n Oebbi, aeuddu garasen? Sinna, ad iwexxeo urbaa segsen, u nitni pnamaren
Ayagi, acku nnan: "ur a$ teppep tmes, siwa kra n wussan". I$uoo iten, di ddin nnsen, wayen id snulfuyen
Amek ihi, ma Njemmel iten, ass ideg, ur degs ccekk, yal yiwen ad i$ellet ayen ikseb, nitni ur ppudensen
Ini: "a Oebbi, Agellid n tgelda, Teppakev tagelda i win i K ihwan, Teppeksev tagelda i win i K ihwan, Tepauzzuv win i K ihwan, Tesdulluv win i K ihwan. Lxio deg ufus i K. Ih, Kecc, Tzemrev i yal cci
Tessekcamev iv deg wass. Tessekcamev ass deg iv. Tessuffu$ev amuddir si lmegget. Tessuffu$ev lmegget seg umuddir. Tep$itiv win i K ihwan, war aktili
Lmumnin ur pparan ijehliyen d iebiben nnsen, war lmumnin. Win ixedmen aya, ur illi, s wacemma, ar Oebbi. Kkes ed aeezzeb i teezzbem iman nnwen segsen. Iaaggen awen Oebbi s yiman iS. Tu$alin ar Oebbi
Ini: "ama teffrem i illan deg idmaren nnwen, ne$ tessnaatem t, Oebbi Ieoa t". Ieoa i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. Oebbi Izmer i yal cci
Ass ideg yal iman ad iaf irs ed, wayen ixdem n lxio, akked wayen ixdem n cceoo, ad issirem a ppili, garas yides, tallit $ezzifen! Iaaggen awen Oebbi, af yiman iS. Oebbi d Umain ar imdanen
Ini: "ma teemmlem Oebbi, ddut yidi. A kwen Iauzz Oebbi, ad awen Isemmee ibekkaven nnwen. Oebbi Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ini: "ssemeesset i Oebbi akked Umazan". Ma wexxoen, ihi Oebbi ur Ieemmel ara ijehliyen
Ih, Oebbi Ismenyaf, i imavalen, Adem, Nue, tawacult n Iboahim, tawacult n Aimoan
Wa iurew wa. Oebbi Issel, d Amusnaw
Mi tenna tmeiiut n Aimoan: "a Mass iw! Wekkle$ aK ayen illan di taabbui iw, d lewkala, Eqbel s$uoi. Kecc, ih, d win Isellen, d Amusnaw

Mi p id turew, tenna: "a Mass iw! Urwe$ p id d nnta". - Oebbi Ieoa, sennig akw, d acu d turew. Ddkeo, macci am nnta. - "Nek semma$ as Meryem, rri$ p seddaw tecvai iK, neppat akked tarwa s, mgal Cciian imenfi

Ioeeb yis Mass is, asteoeeb ilhan; Isgem ip, tigmi ilhan; Ikwellef ip i Zakariyya. Yal tikelt ara ioue $uoes Zakariyya ar lmiereb, a n iaf tesaa ooeeq. Inna: "a Meryem! Ansi i m d ikka waya"? Tenna: "s$uo Oebbi. Oebbi, s tidep, Ioeeeeq win i S ihwan, war aktili
D$a Zakariyya inuj $uo Mass is, inna: "a Mass iw! Efk iyi d, s$uoeK, tarwa ifazen. Kecc, s tidep, Tsellev i unuju
Mi ibedd, ipealla di lmeereb, ssawlent as d lmalayek: "Ibecceo ik Oebbi s Yaeia, d atebbet n wawal n Oebbi, d ssid, d azedgan, d nnbi, seg iaaoviyen
Inna: "a Mass iw! Amek ara sau$ aqcic? Ni$ wessre$, tameiiut iw d tiaiqeot". Inna: "akka, Oebbi Ixeddem ayen i S ihwan
Inna: "a Mass iw! Efk iyi d assekni". Inna: "assekni ik, ur tepmeslayev i medden krav wussan. As$al kan. Mmekti d aias Mass ik, sbuccaa iT tameddit, tafrara
Mi s nnant lmalayek: "a Meryem! Oebbi, s tidep, Ifren ikem, Izzazdeg ikem, Ismenyaf ikem i tlawin imavalen
A Meryem! Anez i Mass im, knu yaS, iiinez akked wid iiiinizen
Ayagi si tmucuha i iffren, Nweeea yak t. Ur telliv yidsen, mi jebden taseqqaot, anwa segsen ara itkelfen $ef Meryem. Ur telliv yidsen mi mqellaaen
Mi s nnant lmalayek: "a Meryem! Oebbi, s tidep, Ibecceo ikem s wawal s$uoeS, ism is: lmasie Aisa, mmi s n Meryem; mucaa di ddunit akked laxert; seg iqoiben
A d ipmeslay i medden, si ddue, am unqaqoi, ad yili seg iaaoviyen
Tenna: "a Mass iw! Amek ara sau$ aqcic, ur iyi innul urgaz"? Inna: "akka. Oebbi Ixelleq ayen i S ihwan. Ma Iseyya lameo, ad as Yini kan: "ili"! Ad yili
Ad as Isselmed Tazmamt, uuwab, Tuoa, Linoil

D amazan ar At Isoail: "ni$ nek usi$ d, $uowen, s issekniyen s$uo Mass nnwen. Nek ad awen d xelqe$, s talaxt, ayen icban afoux, ad uuve$ degs, ad iu$al d afoux, ma Ib$a Oebbi. Ad sseelu$ ader$al, amuvin n lbeou, a d ssidre$ lmeggtin, ma Ib$a Oebbi. Ad awen ini$ d acu teppeppem, akked wayen txezznem deg ixxamen nnwen. Deg waya, s tidep, d assekni i kunwi, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
A d tebbte$ iyi d izwaren di Tuoa, ad awen eelle$ kra n wayen illan ipwagdel awen. Usi$ d, $uowen, s ussekni, s$uo Mass nnwen. Eezbet i Oebbi, a$et iyi awal
Oebbi, s tidep, d Mass iw, u d Mass nnwen. Ihi, aabdet eP, d wagi ay d abrid uwqim
Mi israe Aisa tijehli s$uosen, inna: "anwi ay d imaiwnen iw ar Oebbi"? Nnan as d lexwan: "nekwni d imaiwnen n Oebbi. Numen s Oebbi, eched ar nekwni d imvuaen
A Mass nne$! Numen s wayen id Tessersev, nedda d umazan, Aru ya$ seg inagan
Undin. Iundi Oebbi. Oebbi Yif akw imendayen

Mi s Inna Oebbi: "a Aisa! Nek ad Ddme$ ooue ik, a k id Ssali$ $uoI, a k id Ssiferre$ seg wid ijehlen, ad Rre$, wid iddan yidek, sennig wid ijehlen, ar ass n tnekra". Sinna, tu$alin nnwen $uoI, ad Eudde$, garawen, $ef wayen i$ef teppemgarradem
Ma d wid ijehlen, a ten Aaqbe$ di ddunit, di laxert, aaaqeb aqeuean. Ur asen ppilin isellaken
Wanag wid iumnen u xeddmen ayen ilhan, ad asen Ifk arrazen nnsen. Oebbi ur Ieemmel ara imednas
Ayagi i ak Nemmal seg issekniyen, akked usmekti uuwib
Ih, amedya n Aisa, ar Oebbi, am umedya n Adem. Ixelq it seg wakal, sinna, Inna yas: "ili"! Illa
Tidep, s$uo Mass ik. Ur ppili seg wid ipcukkun

I win i k inumren fellas, deffir wayen i k id iusan n tussna, ini: "yyaw a nenced tarwa nne$, tarwa nnwen, tilawin nne$, tilawin nnwen, iman nne$, iman nnwen. Sinna, a nemmesgill, a ndÂ²au ad Ixzu Oebbi ikeddaben
Ih, tagi d tamacahup n tidep, ur illi oebbi siwa Oebbi. Ih, Oebbi, Neppa, war ccekk, d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
Ma wexxren, ihi Oebbi Issen ifessaden

Ini: "a yAt Tezmamt! Yyaw ar wawal azduklan garane$ yidwen. A naabed siwa Oebbi, ur aS nepcarak acemma; ur pparan, kra segne$ kra, d ioebbiten, war Oebbi". Ma wexxoen, init: "cehhdet ar nekwni d imvuaen
A yAt Tezmamt! Acimi temnamarem $ef Iboahim? Ur n risent Tuoa akked Linoil, armi deffir es, day ur tmeyyzem ara
Kunwi, atan temnamarem $ef wayen tessnem. Ihi, acimi temnamarem $ef wayen ur tessinem? Oebbi Issen, kunwi ur tessinem
Ur illi Iboahim d uday ne$ d amasiei, maca illa d amvua imalen ar tidep. Ur illi seg imcurak
Ih, imdanen iqeoben nezzeh ar Iboahim, war ccekk, d wid i t ivefoen, akked Nnbi agi, akked wid iumnen. Oebbi d Bab n lmumnin
Arbaa, seg At Tezmamt, ib$a a kwen itlef. Ara telfen siwa iman nnsen, ur eoin
A yAt Tezmamt! Acimi tugim issekniyen n Oebbi, u kunwi tepwalim
A yAt Tezmamt! Acimi teslusum, i tidep, ayen idensen, u teppeffrem tidep, kunwi teeuam
Arbaa, seg At Tezmamt, inna: "amnet mi iuli wass, s wayen id irsen ar wid iumnen, nekoet tameddit". Amendeo ma a d u$alen

Ppamnet kan win ivefoen ddin nnwen. Ini: "ih, nnhaya d nnhaya n Oebbi. A ppeppunefk i yiwen am wayen i wen ippunefken". Ne$ a kwen namren af Mass nnwen. Ini: "lfevl, s tidep, deg ufus n Oebbi, Ippak it i win i S ihwan". Oebbi d Ajemmal, d Amusnaw
Iaateq aeunu S i win i S ihwan. Oebbi d Bab n lfevl ameqwoaean

Seg wAt Tezmamt, illa win, xas teooiv as adrim aias, ad ak t id irr. Illa wayev segsen, ma teooiv as adinar, ur ak t id ippara, alamma tezgiv $uoes. Akka, acku nitni nnan: "ur a$ d ppawven at war tussna". U ggaren d tikerkas $ef Oebbi, u nitni eoan
Xaii! Win iiifen di lemaahda s, u ieezzebâ¦ihi, Oebbi Ieemmel wid ipeezziben
Ih, wid ippa$en s lemaahda n Oebbi akked tgallit nnsen, ayen oxisen, widak, ur ppawin amur di laxert, ur asen Ipmeslay Oebbi, ur ten id Ipmuqul, ass n tnekra, ur ten Izzizdig. Fellasen aaaqeb aqeoean

Ih, arbaa segsen ssexsaoen Tazmamt s yilsawen nnsen, iwakken a p$ilem n Tezmamt, ayen ur nelli n Tezmamt. Qqaoen: "aya s$uo Oebbi", u neppa ur illi s$uo Oebbi. U qqaren tikerkas $ef Oebbi, u nitni eoan
Ur ippunefk ara i umdan iwumi Ifka Oebbi Tazmamt, uuwab, u Irra t d nnbi, ad iu$al ad yini i medden: "ilit d imdanen iw, war Oebbi". Maca: "ilit d iselmaden, imi tesselmadem Tazmamt, u tlemdem
Ur awen Iumeo ara a pperrem lmalayek akked lambiyya, d imawlan. Day awen Iameo tijehli, mbaad ma tellam d imvuaen

Mi Iiief Oebbi laaqed n lambiyya: "s tidep, Fki$ awen si Tezmamt akw si uuwab, sinna, iusa kwen id umazan, i itebbten ayen illan $uowen. Amnet yis, aiwnet ep". Inna: "taazmem u tqeblem, f waya, laaqed iW"? Nnan as: "naazem". Inna: "ihi, cehhdet, Nek, yidwen, seg inagan
Wid iwexxoen, deffir waya, nitni d iballa$en
Day b$an ddin ur nelli n Oebbi? U Neppa, unzen aS i illan di tmurt akked igenwan, b$an ne$ ugin. Â£uoeS, tu$alin nnsen

Ini: "numen s Oebbi, akked wayen id irsen $uone$, akked wayen id irsen ar Iboahim, Ismaail, Iseaq, Iaaqub, laaoac, ayen ippunefken i Musa, Aisa, akked lambiyya, s$uo Mass nnsen. Ur nesmenyaf yiwen degsen. Nekwni nunez aS
Win ib$an ddin, war annuz, ur ipwaqbal s$uoes. U neppa, di laxert, seg imexsuoen
Amek ara Inhu Oebbi agdud inekoen deffir liman is, u cehhden ar Amazan d tidep, u iusa ten id ubeggen? Oebbi ur Inehhu agdud imednas
Widak, aqeiii nnsen d ddell s$uo Oebbi, d lmalayek, akked imdanen meooa
Degs ad wekkoen; ur ippifsus fellasen uaaqeb, ur stiseren
Kkes ed wid iu$alen nedmen, deffir waya, u xedmen ayen ilhan. Ih, Oebbi Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ih, wid ijehlen, deffir liman nnsen, sinna, rnan di tijehli, ur tepwaqbal nndama nnsen. Widak d im$eooqen
Ih, wid ijehlen, u mmuten d ijehliyen, ur ipwaqbal s$uo yiwen degsen, azal n tmurt n ddheb, a t id ifdu. I widak, aaaqeb aqeoean, ur sain amaiwen
Ur teppawvem ar ppuba, d awez$i, alamma tseddqem seg wayen teemmlem. Kra n wayen tseddqem n cci, ihi, Oebbi Ieoa t
Yal lqut illa ieell i At Isoail, siwa ayen igdel Isoail i iman is, uqbel a d ters Tuoa. Ini: "awit ed Tuoa, $eot ep, ma tessawalem tidep
Wid id igren tikerkas $ef Oebbi, deffir waya, nitni d imednas
Ini: "Inna d Oebbi tidep; ddut d ddin n Iboahim, i imalen ar tidep, ur nelli seg imcurak
Ih, axxam amezwaru, i irsen i medden, war ccekk, d win n Bekka. Ioqa, d nnhaya i imavalen
Degs issekniyen iberrzen; d axxam n Iboahim. Win it ikecmen, atan di laman. I Oebbi, iwata ad euoen medden s Axxam, ma zemren a t awven. Win iugin, ihi, Rebbi ur Iewao ara imavalen
Ini: "a yAt Tezmamt! Acimi tnekoem issekniyen n Oebbi"? Oebbi d Anagi n wayen txeddmem
Ini: "a yAt Tezmamt! Acimi teiieooifem, wid iumnen, seg ubrid n Oebbi? Tessaramem t iaawej, u kunwi d inagan". Ur I$fil Oebbi $ef wayen txeddmem
A wid iumnen! Ma tu$em awal i urbaa, seg wid iwumi teppunefk Tezmamt, a kwen rren d ijehliyen, deffir liman nnwen
Amek tnekoem, u kunwi $oan awen d issekniyen n Oebbi, u, garawen, Amazan iS? Win iiifen di Oebbi, ni$ ipwanha s abrid uwqim
A wid iumnen! Eezzbet i Oebbi, akken Iklal aeezzeb. Ur ppemmtet alamma tunzem

Eifet akw di teemilt n Oebbi, ur ppemfaoaqet. Mmektit ed ayen ikwen I$at Oebbi. Mi tellam d icenga, Issemlal ulawen nnwen. S l$it iS, tu$alem d atmaten. Tellam $ef rrif n maylellif n tmes, Isellek ikwen segs. Akka i wen Ipbeggin Oebbi issekniyen iS, amendeo ma a ppepwanhum
Amar ad yili, segwen, lois i ineccden ar lxio, ippamoen lqanun, itekksen ayen n dir. Widak d imerbae
Ur ppilit am wid imfaoaqen, u mgarraden, deffir n tisin ubeggen $uosen. I widak, aaaqeb aqeoean
ass ideg ara imlulen wudmawen, ara ibriken wudmawen. Wanag wid iwumi ara ibriken wudmawen nnsen: "tnekoem, deffir liman nnwen? Jeoobet aaaqeb, ilmend n wayen tnekoem
Wanag wid iwumi ara a imlulen wudmawen nnsen, ad ilin deg ueunu n Oebbi. Nitni, degs, ad wekkoen
D wigi ay d issekniyen n Oebbi. Neqqao ak ten id, s tidep. Ur Ib$i Oebbi ddens i imavalen
N Oebbi i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. Ar Oebbi tu$alin n lumuo
Tifem akw leoyus id iff$en i medden. Teppamoem lqanun, teppekksem ayen n dir, tumnem s Oebbi. Ppif, i At Tezmamt, lemmer uminen. Garasen lmumnin; tegwti degsen d iballa$en
Cwii kan ara kwen vuooen. Ma nnu$en kwen, ad rewlen, sinna, ur saun amaiwen

Iwwet iten ddell anda ma llan, siwa wid iiifen di teemilt n Oebbi, u di teemilt n medden. Lqan urrif n Oebbi, u te$li d tiggulelt fellasen. Ayagi, acku llan nekoen issekniyen n Oebbi, la neqqen lambiyya, war ssebba. Ayagi, imi auuan u zgaren tilas
Ur aadilen. Illa lois, seg At Tezmamt, i iqqaoen issekniyen n Oebbi deg iv, u nitni kennun
Umnen s Oebbi akked wass aneggaru, ppamoen lqanun, tekksen ayen n dir, peirin ar lxio. Widak seg iaaoviyen
Ayen xedmen n lxio, ur asen ipwankao. Oebbi Issen wid ipeezziben
Ih, wid ijehlen, ur asen d ippawi acemma, ar Oebbi, wayla nnsen, ne$ tarwa nnsen. Widak d at tmes, degs ad wekkoen
Amedya n wayen pseooifen di tmeddurt n ddunit agi, am umedya n wavu, degs abruri. Ieuza iger n ugdud idensen iman is. Isnegr it. Ur ten Idnis Oebbi; d iman nnsen ay dennisen

A wid iumnen! Ur pparat d iebiben, wur nelli segwen. Ur zgalen a kwen hewwlen. B$an a kwen hejjnen. Ni$ ibda d lbwe$v seg imawen nnsen. Ayen iffren deg ulawen nnsen, i$elb it. Ni$ Nbeggen awen ed issekniyen, ma tepmeyyizem

Atan kunwi d wid i ten ieemmlen, ur kwen eemmlen. Tumnem di Tezmamt, s lekmal is. Ma mmugren kwen, ad inin: "numen". Mi $aben, ad $eeeen ivudan nnsen si zzaaf fellawen. Ini: "emmtet si zzaaf nnwen"! Ih, Oebbi Ieoa i illan deg idmaren
Ma iusa kwen id ise$, a ten isnu$ben. Ma tevoa yidwen tucmip, ad feoeen yis. Ma tueboem, u teezbem, ur kwen teiiuoou s wacemma, tandit nnsen. Ni$ Izzi Oebbi i wayen xeddmen
Mi teff$ev, uubee zik, si twacult ik, temmalev i lmumnin imukan umennu$, Oebbi Issel, d Amusnaw
Mi qoib feclent snat n trebbuyaa nnwen, u Oebbi d Bab nnsent. Iwata i yal lmumen, ad ippkel $ef Oebbi
Ni$ Iaiwen ikwen Oebbi di Bado, mi tellam tendellem. Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, amar a ppesnemmrem
Mi tenniv i lmumnin: "day ur testeqnaam ara, mi kwen Iaiwen Oebbi s krav igima n lmalayek, id irsen
Xaii, ma tueboem u teezzbem, ma $ewwsen d fellawen, a kwen Iaiwen Mass nnwen, s smus igima n lmalayek ikkaten
Ur Iga akka Oebbi, siwa i ubecceo nnwen, ad rtieen yis wulawen nnwen. Rrbee s$uo Oebbi kan, Uzmir, Bab n uuwab
Iwakken ad Ioe arbaa n wid ijehlen, ne$ a ten Ieeaa, ad u$alen nne$wnin
Ur k iaana lameo s wacemma. Ad asen Issuref, ne$ a ten Iaaqeb, nitni d imednas
N Oebbi i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. Ipsemmie i win i S ihwan. Ipaaqab win i S ihwan. Oebbi Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
A wid iumnen! Ur teppet rrba ipzeggiden, tepzeggid. Eezzbet i Oebbi, amar a prebeem
Eezzbet ilmend n tmes i ippuheggan i ijehliyen
A$et awal i Oebbi akked Umazan, amar ad yili ueunu fellawen
Â£iwlet ar ssmae s$uo Mass nnwen, akked Loennet iwsaan am tmurt akked igenwan. Teppuhegga d i wid ipeezziben
wid ipseddiqen - saan ne$ xuuuen -, wid isnusun reffu, wid ipsemmieen i medden - Oebbi Ieemmel lauuam
wid, ma xedmen tucmip, ne$ densen iman nnsen, a d mmektin Oebbi, ad ste$foen $ef ibekkaven nnsen. Anwa Ipsemmieen ibekkaven siwa Oebbi? Ur pgerninen deg wayen xedmen, u nitni eoan
Widak, akafi nnsen d ssmae n Mass nnsen, akked leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, degsen ad wekkoen. D arraz igerzen i wid issewqamen
Aaddant tedyanin uqbel nnwen. Iniget di tmurt, walit amek tevoa d wid id iggaren tikerkas
Wagi d abeggen i medden, d nnhaya akked unecced i wid ipeezziben
Ur ppifcilet, ur $webnet, d kunwi i iaalayen, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
Ma ieuza kwen lada, ni$ lada i t icban ieuza agdud. Ussan agi Nerra ten, ger medden, d tidwal, iwakken ad Yissin Oebbi wid iumnen, ad Iddem segwen inagan. Oebbi ur Ieemmel ara imednas
Iwakken ad Ijeooeb Oebbi wid iumnen, u ad Isqucc ijehliyen
Day t$ilem a pkecmem Loennet, wanag ur Ieoi ara Oebbi wid ijuhden segwen, ur Issin ara iueboiyen
Ni$ tepmennim tameppant, uqbel a p id temmagrem. Ni$ twalam p, kunwi tepmuqulem
Mueemmed d Amazan kan. Ni$ aaddan imazanen, uqbel is. Ma immut ne$ ipwan$a, day a ppu$alem ar deffir? Win ara iu$alen ar deffir, ur iiiuoou Oebbi s wacemma. Oebbi ad Ikafi wid isnemmiren
Ur ipmeppat umdan siwa ma Irad Oebbi, di lajel iuran. Win ib$an akafi n ddunit, ad as t Nefk. Win ib$an akafi n laxeot, ad as t Nefk. A Nkafi wid isnemmiren
Aceal n lambiyya i innu$en, idda yidsen urbaa iqwan, ur fcilen seg wayen iten issaatben, deg ubrid n Oebbi, ur xuzen, ur fkin mayna. Oebbi Ieemmel iueboiyen
Awal nnsen, siwa mi nnan: "a Mass nne$! Semmee a$ ibekkaven nne$, akked tugut nne$ di lameo nne$. Tebbet isurifen nne$, Sserbee ane$ $ef ugdud ijehliyen
Ifka yasen Oebbi akafi n ddunit, akked ukafi laali n laxert. Oebbi Ieemmel lauuam
A wid iumnen! Ma tu$em awal i wid ijehlen, a kwen rren ar deffir, a ppu$alem txesoem
Xaii! Oebbi d Bab nnwen. Neppa, Yif akw imaiwnen
A Nessekcem tugdi deg ulawen n wid ijehlen, imi curken i Oebbi, ayen iwumi ur d irs ara udabu. Axxam nnsen d times. A yir tanezdu$t i imednas

Ni$ Issawel awen Oebbi tidep, di lemaahda S, mi ten tesnegrem, s tsrie iS. Armi, mi tfeclem, temnamarem f lameo, taauam mbaad ma Issken awen d ayen teemmlem. Garawen wid ib$an ddunit, garawen wid ib$an laxert. Sinna, Issebaad ikwen fellasen, iwakken a kwen Ijeooeb. Ni$ Isemmee awen. Oebbi d Bab n lfevl i lmumnin
Mi tulim ur d tezzim, u Nnbi inecced ikwen ar ineggura nnwen. Ineuuef awen a$ilif s wayev, iwakken ur t$webnem $ef wayen i wen ioueen, akked wayen ikwen iu$en. Oebbi Ieoa ayen txeddmem

Sinna, deffir u$ilif, Issers awen d laman, ives id i$lin $ef urbaa segwen. Ni$ arbaa peebbioen $ef yiman nnsen, nnwan, $ef Oebbi, ayen ur nelli d tidep, nnwaya n at war tussna. Qqaoen: "day illa wayen i $ iaanan, di lameo"? Ini: "s tidep, lameo akw i Oebbi". Teffren, deg iman nnsen, ayen ur ak mmalen. Qqaoen: "lemmer illi wayen i $ iaanan, di lameo, ur nepwan$a dagi". Ini: "xas ma tellam deg ixxamen nnwen, wid i$ef tura tmen$iwt, a ten tawev s imieoeen nnsen. Iwakken ad Ijeooeb Oebbi i illan deg idmaren nnwen, ad Izzizdeg i illan deg ulawen nnwen. Oebbi Ieoa i illan deg idmaren
Ih, wid segwen iwexxoen asmi mlalent trebbuyaa, d Cciian kan iten iccacven, ilmend n kra n wayen kesben. Ni$ Isemmee asen Oebbi. Akka, Oebbi Ipsemmie, Ieellem

A wid iumnen! Ur ppilit am wid ijehlen. Nnan i watmaten nnsen iunagen di tmurt, ne$ ipna$en: "lemmer llin $uone$, ur mmuten, ur twan$an". Ad Irr Oebbi, ayagi, d aneggaf deg ulawen nnsen! Oebbi Issidir, Ineqq. Oebbi Ipwali ayen txeddmem
Ma tepwan$am deg ubrid n Oebbi, ne$ temmutem, ssmae n Oebbi akked ueunu, war ccekk, ifen ayen la jemaan
Ma temmutem ne$ tepwan$am, war ccekk, ar Oebbi ara tepwafesrem
S ueunu n Oebbi, teelmev $uosen. Lemmer tqeueev, tes$aoev ul ik, ad baaden fellak. Semmee asen, ssuter ad ppusemmeen, ciweo iten $ef lameo. Mi tseyyiv, ppkel $ef Oebbi. Ih, Oebbi Ieemmel wid ippkalen
Ma Iaiwen ikwen Oebbi, ur kwen irennu yiwen. Ma Iooa kwen, anwa illan a kwen iaiwen, deffir eS? Â£ef Oebbi ara ppeklen lmumnin
Ur issefk ara i nnbi ad idnes. Win idensen, a d ias s wayen idnes, ass n tnekra. Sinna, yal wa, ad as ippunefk wayen ikseb. Nitni, ur ten pmeooioen
Day win iddan d llza n Oebbi am win isebebben urrif n Oebbi, u tanezdu$t is d Loahennama? A taggara tucmip
Ur aadilen ar Oebbi. Oebbi Ipwali acu xeddmen
Ni$ Oebbi I$at lmumnin, mi sen d Iuzen Amazan segsen, immal asen issekniyen iS, izzizdig iten, isseefav asen Tazmamt akked uuwab, ulamma llan, zik, di ttelfan n uuee
Ma tu$em tiyta, ni$ terram p berdayen. Tennam: "ansi waya"? Ini: "aya seg iman nnwen". Oebbi, s tidep, Izmer i yal cci
Ayen ikwen iwwten, ass n temlilit n trebbuyaa, s tsrie n Oebbi. Iwakken ad Ieeo anwi ay d lmumnin

u ad Ieeo anwi ay d ixabiten. Nnan asen: "yyaw, nna$et deg ubrid n Oebbi, ne$ eedmet". Nnan: "lemmer nessin a nenna$, yili nedda n yidwen". Assen, nitni, ar tijehli, ne$ $eo liman, ay qeoben kteo. Qqaren, s yimawen nnsen, ayen ur nelli deg ulawen nnsen. Oebbi Yif akw akken Ieoa ayen teffren
Wid innan i watmaten nnsen, u nitni qqimen: "lemmer i $ ssemeessen, ur pwan$en". Ini: "sdarit iman nnwen si tmeppant, ma tessawalem tidep
Ur p$ili mmuten wid ipwan$an deg ubrid n Oebbi. Xaii, d imuddiren. Ad ppuoeeqen ar Mass nnsen
Ad feoeen s wayen i sen Ifka Oebbi, si lfevl iS. Zhan, imi wid deffir sen, mazal ur ten id neleiq, ur ppagawaden, ur $weblen
Zhan s l$it n Oebbi, akked lfevl. Oebbi ur Iveggia arraz n lmumnin
wid id ijawben i Oebbi akked Umazan, mbaad ma saaddan leif. Arraz ameqwoaean i wid, segsen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, u eezzben
wid iwumi nnan medden: "ni$ mlalen fellawen imdanen, ihi, agwadet pen". D$a isnerna liman nnsen, nnan: "Iqadd a$ Oebbi, Awkil Amxallef
U$alen d s l$it n Oebbi akked lfevl, ur ten innul cceoo; ddan d llza n Oebbi. Oebbi d Bab n lfevl ameqwoaean
Akka kan ay d Cciian. Issagwad s imeddukwal is. Ur ten ppagwadet, agwadet iyI, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
Ur k $webbnen wid ip$awalen ar tijehli. Nitni, s tidep, ur vvuooen Oebbi, s wacemma. Ib$a Oebbi ur asen Iteg amur di laxert. Fellasen aaaqeb aqeoean
Ih, wid iu$en tijehli s liman, ur vvuooen Oebbi s wacemma. Fellasen aaaqeb aqeoean
Ur eeppben wid ijehlen, ar telha yasen, lmudda i sen Nefka. Nefka yasen kan lmudda, iwakken ad rnun ibekkaven. Fellasen aaaqeb isdullun

Ur illi di leb$i n Oebbi, ad Ioo lmumnin di lieala nnwen, alamma Ifrez axabit seg umain. Ur illi di leb$i n Oebbi, ad awen Imel tabavnit. Maca, Iferren Oebbi wid i S ihwan, d imazanen iS. Ihi, amnet s Oebbi akked imazanen iS. Ma tumnem, u teezzbem, a ppawim arraz ameqwoaean

Ur eeppben wid ipcueeun deg wayen i sen Ifka Oebbi, si lfevl iS, ard lxio nnsen. Xaii, d cceoo nnsen. Ayen cueeen a ten iarez seg umgaov, ass n tnekra. I Oebbi, lweot n tmurt akked igenwan. Oebbi Ieoa ayen txeddmem
Ni$ Isla Oebbi i wawal n wid innan: "s tidep, Oebbi d igellil, nekwni d isaayen". A Naru ayen nnan, akked wayen n$an n lambiyya, war ssebba. Ad asen Nini: "jeoobet aaaqeb ujajie
Ayagi, ilmend n wayen xedmen ifassen nnwen. Oebbi ur Ipdennis imdanen

Wid innan: "Ih, Oebbi Iaahed a$ ur neppamen s Umazan, alamma issenaat a$ d asfel, ara tecc tmes". Ini: "ni$ usan kwen id imazanen, uqbel iw, s ubeggen, akw s wayen d tennam. Ihi, acimi i ten ten$am, ma tessawalem tidep
Ma skaddben k, ni$ skaddben imazanen, uqbel ik, usan d s ubeggen, Ihellilen, akked Tezmamt timnewweot
Yal iman ad ijeooeb tameppant. Ass n tnekra, ad awen ippunefk, kan, warraz nnwen. Win isellken si tmes, ikecmen Loennet, ni$ irbee. Tameddurt, di ddunit, d zzhu kan ip$uooun
A ppeppujeoobem deg wayla nnwen akked yiman nnwen. Ad wwten aias degwen, wid iwumi teppunefk Tezmamt, uqbel nnwen, akked imcurak. Ma tueboem u teezzbem, ayagi, s tidep, d ayen isseleayen lumuo
Mi Iiief Oebbi laaqed n wid iwumi teppunefk Tezmamt: "a p tbeggnem i medden, ur p teppeffrem". Rran p deffir izugar nnsen, u$en yis, ayen irxisen. I icmet wayen u$en
Ur p$ili ad sellken, seg uaaqeb, wid ifeoeen s wayen fkan, u b$an a ten ccekoen $ef wayen ur xdimen. Fellasen aaaqeb aqeoean
N Oebbi tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. Oebbi Izmer i yal cci
Ih, di lxelq n tmurt akked igenwan, akked umgirred n yiv akked wass, d issekniyen i uaqilen
Wid id ismektayen Oebbi s ibeddi, s i$imi, s tueela. Pmeyyizen lxelq n tmurt akked igenwan. A Mass nne$! Ur Texliqev aya d aeerfi. Gedha s yiseK! Sellek a$ seg uaaqeb n tmes
A Mass nne$! Ni$, s tidep, Kecc, Texziv win Teskecmev ar tmes. Ur llin wid ara isellken imednas
A Mass nne$! S tidep, nesla i uneccad, la inecced ar liman: "amnet s Mass nnwen"! Numen. A Mass nne$! Semmee a$ ibekkaven nne$, Kkes ane$ tucmitin nne$, Ssiwev a$, ar ssmae iK, akked wid zeddigen
A Mass nne$! Efk ane$ ayen i a$ Taahdev s imazanen iK; ur a$ Xezzu ass n tnekra. Kecc, s tidep, ur Tzeglev lemaahda

Irra yasen Mass nnsen: "Nek ur Veggiae$ igi n win, segwen, issewqamen, d ddkeo ne$ d nnta. Wa ikka d seg wa. Wid iunagen, u ssuff$en ten seg ixxamen nnsen, iaatben deg ubrid iW, innu$en, ipwan$an, war ccekk, ad asen Kkse$ tucmitin nnsen, a ten Skecme$ ar leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen". D akafi s$uo Oebbi. Oebbi, $uoeS akafi amxallef
Ur k ipqelliq lexdaa n wid ijehlen di temdint
Cwii n zzhu, sinna, axxam nnsen d Loahennama. A yir usu
Maca, i wid ieezzben i Mass nnsen: leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, degsen ad wekkoen, d inebgawen n Oebbi. U d wayen illan ar Oebbi, d amxallef i izedganen

Ih, seg wAt Tezmamt, wid iumnen s Oebbi, s wayen akw i wen ed irsen, akked s wayen i sen d irsen. Unzen i Oebbi, ur u$en ara s issekniyen n Oebbi, ayen oxisen. I widak, arraz s$uo Mass nnsen. Ni$ Oebbi Ip$awal deg uqeiii
A wid iumnen! Ueboet, aznet uubeo, begset, eezzbet i Oebbi, amar a prebeem
